name: Sokrati
tag_list: digital-marketing, marketing-agency, search-marketing, display-marketing, ppc-marketing, social-marketing, sem-software
overview:
Sokrati is a Digital Marketing and Analytics company in India, founded by ex-Amazonians primarily to address existing inefficiencies & challenges in managing Search Marketing campaigns for Advertisers in Online Retail & Travel Sectors. We’ve now grown & expanded our services to offer an integrated platform to effectively manage Campaigns across Search, Display & Social Medial Digital Marketing Networks.

With the passion to build a large company in the global digital marketing space, recently Sokrati secured series A funding from venture capital investor, Inventus Capital Partners. Sokrati is also Google’s largest SMB partner in India.

Today, Sokrati drives over 12 million monthly visits to advertisers by managing over 100 million active ad entities on a real-time basis. Several top brands in e-commerce, travel and finance sectors across India and USA enjoy higher conversion rates with Sokrati’s digital marketing and analytics platform. Sokrati has been named as one of the ‘Top 20 Hottest Technology Startups’ in India by Techcircle.
